cards.title: Animal Messenger
cards.description: Use a Tiny beast to deliver a message to a specified location and recipient within range. The beast travels towards the location at a speed of 50 miles per 24 hours for flying creatures, or 25 miles for others. If the message is not delivered befo...

cards.title: Calm Emotions
cards.description: "Emotion Suppression: Suppress charm/fear effects or make targets indifferent to chosen creatures in a 20-ft radius. Ends if attacked or harm seen. Hostility resumes when spell ends."

cards.title: Enthrall
cards.description: Cast "Dissonant Whispers" to force creatures to make a wisdom saving throw or take psychic damage and move away. Those who fail have disadvantage on perception checks against others while they can hear you.

cards.title: Hold Person
cards.description: Paralyze humanoid target with a failed Wis save, allowing saves each turn to end the spell.

cards.title: Suggestion
cards.description: Suggestion: Influences a creature to follow a reasonable course of action for the spell's duration, as long as it does not cause direct harm. Target must make a Wisdom saving throw; ends if harmed or if the task is completed.

cards.title: Zone Of Truth
cards.description: Zone of Truth creates a 15-ft magical area where creatures must make a Charisma saving throw to avoid being unable to lie. You know their saving throw results and they can choose to stay silent or be evasive within the truth's limits.
